item.title: Real life Rest API Versioning for dummies
item.description: Once upon a time an API … Second Law of Consulting “No matter how it looks at first, it’s always a people problem” - Gerald M. Weinberg Once upon a time, the ACME Corporation was building a brand new IT product. It aimed at a new software to manage bookstores through a web interface and an API. In the first steps, the developers drew up a first roadmap of their API based on the expectations of their first customers.
